Oh hohoho, this is rich, an "essay", huh? I forget that to you "my boi/guy", "ya", "yeye" types orcs (I can always tell from their ghetto lingo) anything that goes past 2 - 3 lines is considered a college essay and "dey muh b mad AF, yo!" as it exceeds their limited attention span. Now I do admit in hindsight that my comment back then was a tad bit over the top (must've dealt with too many vanillasoyfags yampering about NTR in the comments of NTR works that day and up to that point, blew it off in that comment), that said, vanillafags aren't exactly saints, far from it in fact, suggest "non-wholesum" stuff in a vanilla artist's work, you'll see flames that'll make mine look like mere petty embers when it comes to "toxic attitudes". I've seen how vanillafags get when thoughts/opinions doesn't align with their hive mind and for how quick you are to call "hate", seems to me that vanillafans like to dish out but can't take in, thin skinned as a fly. It's the hypocritical double standards.
Time to kill some daughters.

The plot isn't what I'd call "good", but it's better than Aya's other works for me. I love Aya's artstyle, but got dissapointed at Aya's taste (yes, I'm a vanilla fag, yes, I hate NTR, and yes, I've blacklisted NTR), but this one is by far Aya's best work, seeing that there's none of thise cursed tags. Wish Aya could make more like this tbh.
